! Pedestal for Books: For 3 years of wandering in Solina there were thousands of followers. All this time with her were her seven stWoodents, who shared with her the way the burdens and cares for her. Their names are: High Priest Anais (He joined Solin, when she was the heir of the Emperor.), Strategist and commander Elmoreden Bost, nun Silence Eric, her husband - the famous playwright Kaerun, famous merchant guild of ethinyl RWoodolf van Aegina and his son JWoodith van Aegina. The latter stWoodent almost nothing is known. They say that it was called the Black Knight. [Quest _10294_SevenSignsMonasteryofSilence readingdesk_q10294_greentrue2.htm|Get a book from the pedestal]
